offerpromotionconten.fineprinttext: *Price and Visa Reward Card offers are available to new residential customers enrolling with Grand Rapids Energy between 01/02/2018 and 01/31/2018 using applicable promotion code. GRE service is available for eligible customers participating in the Gas Customer Choice program through Consumers Energy. GRE rates do not include taxes or local utility charges. For more information regarding terms and conditions, call 1.800.541.1541, write to Grand Rapids Energy, 400 Renaissance Center, Ste. 2600, Detroit, MI 48243 or visit grandrapidsenergy.com. Early termination charges apply for residential fixed price plans (6-Month plan: $75). Customer must have continuous active service with Grand Rapids Energy for at least 60 days to be eligible to receive the Visa Reward Card. After reaching eligibility, please allow 4-6 weeks for delivery. Visa Reward Card is issued by and is property of CenterState Bank of Florida, NA pursuant to a license from Visa U.S.A. Inc. Cannot be combined with any other offer. ƗAlternative gas supplier (AGS) price comparison based on Michigan.gov/CompareMIGas website published prices as of 01/02/2018 and GRE's January 2018 direct mail price offers.
offerpromotionconten.heading: Not all natural gas plans are the same... switch to Grand Rapids Energy® now!
offerpromotionconten.text:
Lock in the LOWEST FIXED PRICE in the market!Ɨ

You have a choice when it comes to your natural gas supplier. So why not enroll in the lowest available 6-Month fixed price in the market? This offer is only available for a limited time, so act now!

SPECIAL BONUS- Receive a $25 Visa® Reward Card!

Switching is easy.

- Locate your most recent natural gas bill.

- Identify your utility account number.

- Enroll. 

With GRE, there are NO sign-up fees and NO interruption of service.

Hurry! Offer ends {{expirationdate}}.  

Program Terms and Conditions >
